{"id":1025244967,"lang":"rust","lang_name":"Rust","time":"3 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1692397001,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1025244967/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"2.2 MB","code":"impl Solution {\n    pub fn my_pow(x: f64, n: i32) -> f64 {\n        if n == 0 {\n            return 1.0;\n        }\n\n        let mut result = 1.0;\n        let mut base = x;\n        let mut exponent = n as i64;\n\n        if exponent < 0 {\n            base = 1.0 / base;\n            exponent = -exponent;\n        }\n\n        while exponent > 0 {\n            if exponent % 2 == 1 {\n                result *= base;\n            }\n            base *= base;\n            exponent /= 2;\n        }\n\n        result\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
